meanings.sent1: The treacheries of the villain led to the downfall of the hero.
meanings.sent2: The history books were filled with tales of treacheries committed by rulers.
meanings.sent3: The treacheries in the mystery novel kept the readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: The treacheries of the past haunted the kingdom like lingering shadows.
meanings.sent5: The treacheries of war left scars on the hearts of the survivors.

meanings.sent1: The treacheries of the con artist were finally exposed.
meanings.sent2: The treacheries of the spy were uncovered by the intelligence agency.
meanings.sent3: The treacheries of the mischievous cat involved stealing treats from the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The treacheries of the storm clouds deceived the farmers with false promises of rain.
meanings.sent5: The treacheries of the mirror distorted reality, showing a false reflection.
